name: I dreamed of Matriochkas in Paris
name_original: I dreamed of Matriochkas in Paris
description:
DESCRIPTION

A short puzzle game in wich you explore the depths of a strange dream.  

Interact with objects in your environment to change the dream and progress to the end.

CONTROLS

Move : WASD / ZQSD  
Interact : Space

CREDITS

Hobzonte
Sirkovitch
